original_text: When ye be come into the land of Canaan, which I give to you for a possession, and I put the plague of leprosy in a house of the land of your possession;
korean_text: 내가 네게 기업으로 주는 가나안 땅에 너희가 이를 때에 너희 기업의 땅에서 어떤 집에 나병 색점을 발생하게 하거든

sentences.original_text: When ye be come into the land of Canaan
which I give to you for a possession
and I put the plague of leprosy
in a house of the land of your possession
